# Zeebe
## Enhancements
### Broker
* Create `DbTenantAwareKey` ([#14019](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14019))
* Add auth data to Zeebe records ([#13989](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13989))
* Provide an API for data interchange of Zeebe auth data ([#13988](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13988))
* Provide a `TenantAccessChecker` API for multi-tenancy ([#13987](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13987))
* Show blacklisting in the Grafana Dashboard ([#8263](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/8263))
### Gateway
* Allow using the default tenant even when no tenant associated to requester ([#14497](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14497))
* Gateway supports multi-tenancy in EvaluateDecision RPC ([#14278](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14278))
* Gateway supports multi-tenancy in PublishMessage RPCs ([#14276](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14276))
* Job polling/pushing in the Gateway supports multi-tenancy ([#14254](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14254))
* Gateway supports multi-tenancy in CreateProcessInstance* RPCs ([#14211](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14211))
* I can use a Gateway configuration flag for multi-tenancy ([#14041](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14041))
* Add auth data to Zeebe records ([#13989](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13989))
* Provide an API for data interchange of Zeebe auth data ([#13988](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13988))
* Provide a `TenantAccessChecker` API for multi-tenancy ([#13987](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13987))
* Support multi-tenancy in the Gateway ([#13237](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13237))
### Java Client
* The JobWorker API of the java client support multi-tenancy ([#14255](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14255))
* job.getVariable ergonomic method in Java client ([#13752](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13752))
* Java client supports multi-tenancy for the ActivateJobs/StreamJobs commands ([#13560](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13560))
* Java client supports multi-tenancy for PublishMessage RPC ([#13559](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13559))
* Java client supports multi-tenancy for EvaluateDecision RPC ([#13557](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13557))
* Java client supports multi-tenancy for CreateProcessInstance* RPCs ([#13536](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13536))
* Stream jobs using job worker ([#13473](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13473))
* newModifyProcessInstanceCommand: complete command with single variable ([#13460](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13460))
* newThrowErrorCommand: complete command with single variable ([#13458](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13458))
* newFailCommand: complete command with single variable ([#13456](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13456))
* newBroadcastingSignalCommand: complete command with single variable ([#13451](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13451))
* newEvaluateDecisionCommand: complete command with single variable ([#13449](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13449))
* newPublishMessageCommand: complete command with single variable ([#13447](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13447))
* newCreateInstanceCommand: complete command with single variable ([#13443](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13443))
* Allow custom job worker executors ([#13428](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13428))
* Java client supports multi-tenancy for DeployResource RPC ([#13321](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13321))
* Configure the client's inbound max_message_size ([#12122](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12122))
* Introduce JobWorker metrics for the Java client ([#4700](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/4700))
### zbctl
* Remove zbctl from 8.3 images going forward ([#13024](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13024))
### Misc
* Support Multi-tenant Form deployments ([#14555](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14555))
* Add tests to verify Incident behaviour when form not found during user task activation ([#14302](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14302))
* Receive tenantId in the Form deployment response ([#14270](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14270))
* Add tenantId to the Form deployment gRPC response ([#14269](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14269))
* Support versioning of the Forms in the state ([#14268](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14268))
* Export Deployment Record with form metadata ([#14248](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14248))
* Export Form Deployment record to Opensearch ([#14222](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14222))
* zeebe running with relatively high idle CPU load ([#14187](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14187))
* Add support to Java client for returning Form metadata in DeployResource gRPC response ([#14139](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14139))
* Export form key of the latest form on user task activation ([#14138](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14138))
* Implement query to retrieve the latest form by formId from the state ([#14137](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14137))
* Export Form Deployment record to Elasticsearch ([#14136](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14136))
* Allow binding forms to start events by formId ([#14135](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14135))
* Allow binding forms to user tasks by formId ([#14134](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14134))
* Save Form to the state ([#14133](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14133))
* Handle Form Deployment in the Engine ([#14132](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14132))
* Implement Form Deployment gRPC endpoint in the Gateway ([#14131](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14131))
* Add integration tests for Job Push ([#13516](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13516))
* Validate user input before registering a worker to the job stream ([#13465](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13465))
* Implement ZeebeClient wrapper for the StreamJobs RPC ([#13429](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13429))
* A ResolveIncident request/command supports tenant validation ([#13426](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13426))
* A ThrowError request/command supports tenant validation ([#13425](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13425))
* Support multi-tenancy for setting variables on a process instance scope ([#13388](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13388))
* Delete and recreate signal subscription of previous version ([#13354](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13354))
* Add and handle Process Deleting event ([#13349](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13349))
* Add a `state` to `PersistedProcess` ([#13348](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13348))
* An UpdateJobRetries request/command supports tenant validation ([#13347](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13347))
* A FailJob request/command supports tenant validation ([#13346](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13346))
* Migrate running process instance into `PROCESS_INSTANCE_KEYS_BY_DEFINITION_KEY` ColumnFamily ([#13343](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13343))
* Remove from `PROCESS_INSTANCE_KEYS_BY_DEFINITION_KEY` ColumnFamily ([#13342](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13342))
* Insert into the `PROCESS_INSTANCE_KEYS_BY_DEFINITION_KEY` ColumnFamily ([#13341](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13341))
* Add `PROCESS_INSTANCE_KEYS_BY_DEFINITION_KEY` ColumnFamily ([#13340](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13340))
* Support multi-tenancy for BPMN timer events ([#13337](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13337))
* Add Resource Deleting intent ([#13335](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13335))
* Engine can process multi-tenant DeploymentRecord commands ([#13320](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13320))
* Gateway supports multi-tenancy in deployment RPCs ([#13319](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13319))
* `JobBatchRecord` and `JobActivationProperties` provide tenant information ([#13318](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13318))
* Jobs are pushed/polled only for requested tenants ([#13317](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13317))
* A CompleteJob request/command supports tenant validation ([#13316](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13316))
* Support multi-tenancy for process instance operations (modify, cancel, set variables) ([#13288](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13288))
* Support multi-tenancy for core BPMN process operations ([#13279](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13279))
* Notify Zeebe Team in Slack when an issue is labelled as critical ([#13253](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13253))
* Support multi-tenancy for deployments ([#13238](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13238))
* As a Zeebe Java user, I want to complete a Job with a single variable ([#13040](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13040))
* Export number of buffered messages as metrics ([#12975](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12975))
* Support S3 backup httpclient custom configuration. ([#12942](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12942))
* Add message definition extension elements ([#12878](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12878))
* Provide Error Handler implementation for Job Streamer ([#12796](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12796))
* Allow configuring request timeout for InstallRequest ([#12793](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12793))
* Forcefully terminate a process instance ([#12696](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12696))
* Automatically add `support` label to support related issues ([#12655](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12655))
* Improve the traversing of snapshot files ([#12575](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12575))
* Provide Grafana Dashboards for the Actor metrics ([#12548](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12548))
* Jobs are pushed from relevant processors ([#12541](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12541))
* Create `ProcessInstanceBatch.TERMINATE` processor ([#12539](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12539))
* Use the `ProcessInstanceBatch Command` when terminating container elements ([#12538](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12538))
* Create `ProcessInstanceBatch` Record and Intent ([#12537](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12537))
* Remove the default un-overridable `-Xms128m` value ([#12416](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12416))
* Docker: Run the zeebe process with an unprivileged user by default ([#12382](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12382))
* Zeebe BPMN Model should provide reasonable defaults for definition attributes ([#12283](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12283))
* Job Yield Processor is implemented to be used for Job Push fallback ([#12085](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12085))
* OAuth Auth Token authentication support in Zeebe Gateway ([#12000](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12000))
* Support Broadcast signal for Signal End Events ([#11920](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/11920))
* Support Broadcast signal for Signal Intermediate Throw Events ([#11919](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/11919))
* Add gRPC job stream API ([#11708](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/11708))
* Support BPMN Converging Inclusive Gateway ([#10031](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/10031))
## Bug Fixes
### Broker
* Potential inconsistency in raft after restoring from a backup ([#14509](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14509))
* Failure to write snapshot checksum is silently ignored ([#14486](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14486))
* Migration could result in inconsistent data on rolling update ([#14406](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14406))
* Duplicate snapshot replication causing to fail raft follower ([#14367](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14367))
* Cannot process record due to process deployed version being null. ([#14309](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14309))
* IndexedRaftLogEntry are kept in memory until committed, which can lead to OOM ([#14275](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14275))
* No executable process found while processing Deployment:Create command ([#14055](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14055))
* Backpressure queue is not reset when back-to-back role transitions ([#14044](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14044))
* Condition ignored on Inclusive Gateway with singular outgoing Sequence Flow ([#13936](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13936))
* Regression in deploying large payloads ([#13233](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13233))
* `RandomizedRaftTest.consistencyTestWithSnapshot` fails with unexpected exception ([#13093](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/13093))
* Failing to write to logstream during stepdown is logged as error ([#12780](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/12780))
* Messaging service is not running ([#7855](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/7855))
* Startup failure of one raft partition server affects the availability of other healthy partition ([#5209](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/5209))
* I can spawn inner instances for a large input collection ([#2890](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/2890))
### Gateway
* Prevent concurrent StreamObserver calls on the same instance ([#14236](https://github.com/camunda/zeebe/issues/14236))
### Java Client
